column3: “Man this strain is chronic! Smoke this and it instantly hits you like a brick wall! Got hold of a sample so didn't have too much and ended up sharing one joints worth between 3 of us - and it's a good job too. Fried the lot of us and safe to assume you don't need much of this to feel the full effects. Was a smooth smoke which took me by surprise but nevertheless a bonus.  At first I was in a heavy body high state, bu...”

“I experienced the most intense happiness and deepest sadness all at once and I loved every moment of it! my mind was alert the whole time, me and my husband had the best bonding experience last night on this stuff. We chattered, and shared so much about ourselves and each other. I must say, I love the deep awareness of myself and others that I felt last night after smoking this strain. Definately my favourite so far!...”
“Great pick me up w/earthy, kushy tones. Great focusing medication.”
“Very tank crytally covered buds.. Sativa in structure and high.. Very tasty, very potent.”

“Very dank, trich covered exotic sativa buds. Amazing smell and flavor both on inhale and exhale.. The buds themselves smell like rotten fruit and dank. Amazing strain tested at 20% thc and .33 % cbd which is high... Amazing strain bought legally in Washington state, the company, Spark" that grows it grows using an advanced light controlled greenhouse. The cure is great... Grown great.. Amazing strain.. amazing sativ...”"

“Absolutely love this strain. 
Great head high I'm able to focus on work and just be in a great mood the entire time. 
Great body high as well. all around one of my favorite strains by far.”
“Nice sativa made me cough, nice high very upbeat also sex was amazing”
“Love it, gave me such a happy lift.”
“Love it, gave me such a happy lift.”
“taste was nice for sure. I noticed it took me longer to get high which I didn't like but when the high hit is was a non overpowering euphoric high”
“Alert, appetite suppressant, relaxing and sensual.”
“After a long work day, loaded a bowl and was almost instantly energized. Helped curb my social anxiety enough for a party. Very, very good!!!!”

“Just got a taste and feel for this bud and it's definitely up there on my sativa list, if you want to just chill and think about life or watch Netflix you can, if you feel like you need to get something done This strain actually makes you get off your ass and do it. I came home thinking I was going to get home and be couch locked and forget, instead this strain actually convinced me to get up and do my errands I owe ...”
“I did not felt like Hulk at any point but felt more like professor X! Smoke this and get shit done.”

“On cloud nine and didn't even finish the bowl. I've cut down my usage from being stoned 24/7 to a couple bowls a day. Weed is weed, and high is high, but when you've grown a tolerance the high it becomes more comfortable than exciting. This weed takes me on different roller-coaster rides each time I smoke it.  Right now my mind is thinking about a thousand different things at once, yet it's not overwhelming or stress...”
“Favorite strain so far no sleepiness, no munchies. makes me aroused my girl even noticed.”
“After a long work day, loaded a bowl and was almost instantly energized. Helped curb my social anxiety enough for a party. Very, very good!!!!”
“Definitely a strand that keeps my mind flowing. I have the munchies and dry mouth lol. FYI the 'coming down' is real bc it makes you super relaxed. But it is also a pick-me-upper.”

“The buds I got l are a light green and not dense at all.  Very light feeling actually.   Quite a few orange hairs throughout with a  sweet almost skunky scent.

The vapour is of good consistency and is fairly smooth with maybe a little bite at the end.

When my tolerance was higher this stuff did not work well.  After a 2 week break the effects are stronger but still on the light side.   I'm a little disappointed bec...”

“Love this strain man. It took a minute to hit me but once it hit me... it hit me like crazy. We did a couple rounds before we got high. I took one huge hit towards the middle and right when I took that hit I was smacked. Get it if you wanna be incredibly happy stoned. I forgot everything about that night tho, just remember it was a dope feeling.”
“Good high, sleepiness like an indica though..”
“Don't use this if you have a chronic pain.  Only plus side is that it taste like blueberries.”
“Such an on point sativa. But for some reason I feel like this should be a hybrid. I get the creative energy but when the high subsides its a deep body high. Overall amazing strain”
“THE VERY BEST! All I can say is it was smoked at night time.......and it felt like daytime. Super creative high”
“Definitely a strand that keeps my mind flowing. I have the munchies and dry mouth lol. FYI the 'coming down' is real bc it makes you super relaxed. But it is also a pick-me-upper.”
“Fantastic strand, really good high, even better taste and smell. Definitely a strand to try.”
“THE VERY BEST! All I can say is it was smoked at night time.......and it felt like daytime. Super creative high”
“It's amazing. Good couch lock buzz. Helps with anxiety”

“This strain is AAA, buds shld come out like big dense golf balls that wen cracked open a bouquet of tropical smells...Long lasting great uplifting high! Strong enough for pain relief, but works for all bc Jack in cross..GC x JH, two SUPER SOLID classics especially the Jack that rly shines thru on my cut👍🤘! If u see a good cut def worth grabbing, hits body well also after it settles in.”
“Such an on point sativa. But for some reason I feel like this should be a hybrid. I get the creative energy but when the high subsides its a deep body high. Overall amazing strain”
“Good high, sleepiness like an indica though..”

“The buds I got l are a light green and not dense at all.  Very light feeling actually.   Quite a few orange hairs throughout with a  sweet almost skunky scent.

The vapour is of good consistency and is fairly smooth with maybe a little bite at the end.

When my tolerance was higher this stuff did not work well.  After a 2 week break the effects are stronger but still on the light side.   I'm a little disappointed bec...”

“This strain is AAA, buds shld come out like big dense golf balls that wen cracked open a bouquet of tropical smells...Long lasting great uplifting high! Strong enough for pain relief, but works for all bc Jack in cross..GC x JH, two SUPER SOLID classics especially the Jack that rly shines thru on my cut👍🤘! If u see a good cut def worth grabbing, hits body well also after it settles in.”
“Absolutely love this strain! Smoked it this past weekend with a few mates and didn't stop talking after the 1st pull. Great mood as energy lifter.”
“Fantastic strand, really good high, even better taste and smell. Definitely a strand to try.”

“Tasted odd but good, took a little bit of time to kick in (aprox. 10-20min) but when it did it was amazing. Was a very euphoric high and surprisingly although this is sativa it was very relaxing as well as hyped.”
“SO strong, amazing high, one of my favourites.”
“The best énergetic weed i never smoke .”
“I love this strain. It helped give me a little umph in order to actually START working on my projects. This is in my top 10, I’d say.”

“I bought an Incredible Hulk wax cartridge and this was by far the BEST decision I’ve ever made. You feel so happy and uplifted and alert, and it helps a lot if you have problems socializing. It made me really talkative and it helped me finish my homework SO MUCH faster that I would have sober. It is perfect for focusing and learning new things; it’s not the kind of weed that makes you feel dumb. Because of this, it i...”
“Oh God this is potent it comes on fast and slams you like car crash the smell is a butter ammonia earthy smell”
“Focused, Energetic and Creative. Feb 2018”

“Man I had a joint with the homie I had 6 or 7 big hits and didn't feel anything. He finished the rest of it and we started walking towards the subway to go to a friend's. A minute later on the way there it hit out of nowhere like a 747! Hopped on the plane and flew from the streets of London to cloud 9 in an instant. Very heavy euphoric head high almost like tripping on shrooms without the warping visuals, but not to...”
“as incredible as the hulk and hits like a truck”
“Don't like many sativa's but this is by far my favorite, had a nice citrus smell when in bud form and grinded up, also really big thick green nugs”
“not great for intense pain, but soothes the background" aches & pains. feeling kinda mellowly euphoric & concentration/cognitive functioning is AMAZING - i'm multitasking to shit here
column4: and pulling it off!! :3 creativity and organizational skills seem amplified - generally feel mentally energised (and all this is happening on a major fibro crash day). Love it!!”"

column3: “Strong sativa with high energy high. A bit too heady for my tastes.. good vibes but not great for day high in public”
“not a big sativa guy, but this does the trick”
“Very heady strain and it’s so gasy”
“Green Crack and Jack Herer mixed... need I say more?  Darn close to the perfect high on a Sativa!  Incredible is correct...”
“it's not feels as described.”
“I didn’t get the full flavor of this strain. Did notice a shift in mental thoughts. Uplifting and stress free.”

“This strain is amazing. I get migraines and I've tried a lot of different strains. I've found a few that help prevent migraines, but this is the first one that actually got rid of a full blown one. 

In addition, it was uplifting, happy, arousing, euphoric and creative. It was great. 

My only complaint is that it is really hard to find. I wish I knew who created this and is growing it. None of the stores in town hav...”
“Don't think it's incredible at all. More cerebral than body high and not the best for pain.”
“Fantastic wake and cake Sativa. Definitely a creeper.”

“This is a good strain had the kick of its parent green crack but has a deep coming down... it is a quick and fast burning high good for deep thoughts but not lasting creativity each time I smoked this it lead to a big crash and I ended up waking up the next day even though i planed on doing some deep research and study on it. It is a good pick up over all just use it as a social strain not a work strain.”
“Amazing feeling of euphoria. Gave me the munchies. I caped with it and it was like smoking for the first time.”
“Really nice weed, a little bit lighter/fluffy buds, but led to very fun night! made me a bit more dizzy than I'd like but overall great stuff!”
“Honestly my favorite”
“Buen sabor dulce pero con efectos creativos”

“Very uplifting, energetic bud. Gets you going and gets you up. Perfect for a wake and bake session. Definitely recommend. Heavy sativa but not over powering. Still get a bit of indica feel to it as well.”
“fire!”

“This mellow strain is perfect for morning inside your house , chilly and uplifting .
The taste is earthy and mildly sweet .
Easy to inhale and exhale .
Good for minor back pain and minor aches .
The strain does not show a strong character but it's generally good , smoke it if you found it . 3.5/5.”
“One of the best strains I've had in a few months. Fun and euphoric.”
“I jus had it and it gave me a great mood boosting happy high”
“Taste is very nice, resiny, how I like it, the high is cerebral, body feels relaxed, munchies, love this.”
“the strian has great flavor has alot of oramge hairs amd has a orangy piney smell”
“LOVED IT!!!! Had me and my girlfriend coughing on the first hit and she never coughs it was a nice high and definitly gave us the munchies 5Stars”

“this a bunk strain total CRAP dont waste time or money on this sum strains
 should be discarded and this is one”
